forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. West wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening embraces Downtown San Francisco, clouds cloak the sky in a gentle embrace, heralding a low temperature of about 52 degrees. The westerly winds carry a brisk vitality, whispering through the streets at 18 mph and gusting higher, stirring a sense of liveliness in the air. Tonight’s ambiance feels comfortably cool, though the occasional chill penetrates, reminding us of the city’s quirkier temperament. With low visibility held in the shroud of cloud cover, any lingering fog seems to tease at the edges of visibility, inviting the heart to anticipate clearer skies.

Tomorrow promises a transformation under the sun's affectionate gaze, as the forecast suggests a delightful transition to mostly sunny conditions. The temperature will peak around 68 degrees, a perfect prelude to engaging in the city's charm. While the wind may still accompany you during your strolls, donning a light jacket or a cozy cardigan seems prudent for the early parts of the day. Embrace the opportunity to wander along the waterfront, perhaps indulging in a late-morning coffee at a quaint café while watching the day unfurl around you. As you dash through the streets, take a moment to admire the architecture that rises proudly on the horizon, standing in juxtaposition to the natural spectacle unfolding overhead—clouds gradually yielding to sunlight, stirring the promise of a lovely day ahead.
